body.name: Furniwell Convertible Sectional Sofa Couch, 4 Seat Sofa Set for Living Room U-Shaped Modern Fabric Modular Sofa Sleeper with Double Chaise & Memory Foam (Grey)
features: 3 Packages: The sectional couch set is delivered in three boxes. The cushions are vacuum-packed. After opening the package, please wait 48 hours to let it come back to its original shape for the better experience.

Comfortable Sectional Couch: The seat and soft back cushion covered with breathable linen fabric. Sitting, lying down, or relaxing, this couch for living room will make your leisure time more enjoyable.
Durble and Washable: Wood frame provide durability and stability for long-term use. The seat and back cushion covers are removable and washable, you can keep clean and comfy easily.
Minimalism Design: No redundant complex design, smooth lines outline simple modeling, the sectional sofa is suitable for a living room, apartment, or any modern home style.
Easy to assemble: Following the instruction manual step by step, you can install the U-shaped modular fabric sofa sleeper easily.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: U Shaped Sofa Couch Furniwell is specialized in developing high-quality and unique home furniture since our brand was established. Tips 1. The sofa couch is delivered in 3 boxes. They may arrive separately within 2-3 days. If you do not receive all of them, please wait patiently for a few days. 2. Please confirm whether the size of our products meets your requirements before you buy it! 3. The cushions are vacuum-packed. After opening the package, please wait 48 hours to let it come back to its original shape.
Breathable Fabric Thicked Cushion Card Buckle Design Sturdy Legs

How many packages will the customer receive in total? 3 package. They may arrive separately within different days. If you do not receive all of them, please wait patiently for a few days. Are the cushion covers removable and washable? Yes. The coves can be removed for washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: Like many others, I wasn’t expecting much for the price of this couch. We just needed something to sit/sleep on for my mother’s place. I am very happy with this purchase!This couch was easy to put together and is comfortable. It is firm, but not hard like a rock. If you want more softness, a few throw pillows help. My 6’ tall son sleeps on it with no complaints.I was worried that it was going to be too low, but it’s fine for an average height person. If you need support to get up, this is not for you. The arms are basically cushions.I was also concerned about the material but it looks quite nice in person, and is easy to clean (already had to clean paint off of it with no trouble). I like that you can re-configure it, even though it only “locks” in the shown U shape. Who knows how long this will last, but for the price, it’s fabulous. It seems sturdy enough, but if you’ve got active kids, it might not hold up as long.Overall it’s a great buy for the price! We used the coupon so it was $400 before tax. We’ve already had an guest ask us for the link so they can buy it too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wish I could give this zero stars. Where to startHere is a summary about the unsatisfactory couch:After only one week, this couch has proven to be a disappointment. The zippers on the cushions have already broken, causing the filling to spill out. The size of the couch is smaller than advertised, leaving barely enough room for two people to sit comfortably. The cushions themselves are incredibly stiff and uncomfortable, providing no back support. Worst of all, the Velcro attachments used to combine the chaise pillows and couch sections are a different size, so they do not properly stay connected. I had high hopes for this couch, but it is poorly made and constructed. Within just a few days, the failing zippers, inadequate size, lack of comfort, and mismatching Velcro attachments have demonstrated this couch will not hold up to regular use. I cannot recommend this uncomfortable, poorly designed furniture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and comfy couch, and looks great!
reviews.reviewText: Putting it together was pretty easy. It looks great and it's comfy! The reviews mentioned the color may be off a bit, but it still looks great. It's way bigger than I thought, my husband and I are able to comfortably watch a movie together.One thing is, reviews said cushions/pillows were flat. I fluffed my pillows and they were perfect, besides the left corner. I opened the zipper and found a hole in the "netting" and missing stuffing. just check your pillow(s) in case it seems flatter than usual. I used some extra stuffing from a spare pillow and it's looking good now.Overall, we love the couch. So far it has been pretty sturdy, comfy, and spacious for only 500 dollars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pretty easy to put together. Came in 3 boxes and looks decent. The back cushions are extremely flat, I through a blanket over them. The secrional isn’t comfortable at all. The biggest issue is the eye watering, headache inducing smell/odor!!! It’s super strong and smells like chemicals in a science lab. It’s a really disturbing/uncomfortable smell. I haven’t been able to sit on the sectional for longer than 30mins, I just can’t take it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars awesome cheap couch!
reviews.reviewText: First off, I would like to say, to the people that said the assembly was awful, I put the couch together without the instructions. It was the easiest piece of furniture I’ve EVER put together.Secondly, yes, it is cheap so you get what you pay for, BUT this is a really great couch for a single person or couples without kids OR if you’re just on a budget. The last couch I purchased was almost 3k and this was so much cheaper.Third, the backs are a TINY bit flat but you can always get filling for it to your liking. There are springs in the cushions, they’re not bad. Couch does need to rest to plump up. So I would give it at least 24 hours before sitting. Just like anything that’s been vacuumed sealed.Just to be spicy, to the lady that that posted the couch seat all side ways. Imma tell everyone right now, it don’t do that. It literally Velcros in place. LMAO get it, don’t get it. But I’m glad I did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well, I got what I paid for. It is very low to the ground. The cushions do not fluff up. It is hard as a rock it’s not very hard to put together and the shipping sucked. They actually did not bring it to my door. They left it downstairs. I am a smaller woman, I had to call somebody to come and help me carry the boxes upstairs because they use FedEx and lazy shippers. I would send it back but that’s a lot to tear down and move again so I’ll just deal with it but I’m not happy I do not recommend buying this couch to anybody save yourself The $400 and go to the furniture store and buy something useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice. Love it!
reviews.reviewText: It’s really nice for the price. The back coushions are thin and don’t velcro on so they fall down sometimes but it’s fixable with some velcro tape or something. The arm cushions do Velcro on but they’re very thin so I just filled up that space with pillows and it’s not big deal. Definitely not a deal breaker. The color is a little more grey than the picture is but it’s nice. It’s soft and the seat cushions are comfortable. I paid $300 (with a coupon) and it was worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the price!!
reviews.reviewText: Won't allow me to post picture but this couch is horrible! Worst Amazon purchase ever. Nothing like what is pictured. Pattern on fabric is not the same, cushions are so flat and uncomfortable. Its literally painful. I had to go out and buy xtra cushion padding just so we can sit on it. It feels like a rock .No support on back cushions they are completely flat. Tried reaching out to seller to remedy the issue no response whatsoever. Heard from other reviewers that it cost more to return than the actual price of the couch and you don't get refund so that option is out....would like for the company to reach out to me to correct this situation all these bad reviews its getting can't be good for business. For the record I did not see the bad reviews until AFTER the purchase. So buyer beware this couch is awful !!!
